column1: back of a length and slanting away outside off with the angle from over the wicket, punchily played to backward point
pitched further up and angling across off, Denly latches onto the width and carves it away square of backward point
back of a length, pitches outside leg, and swings to catch the thigh pad and roll away behind square
half-volley angling away outside off, the batsman leans into it and caresses the ball through extra-cover. So easy on the eye...
full and outside off, sliced out to point
back of a length and angling down the leg side for a wide. Re-set the radar, James
Faulkner hits a hard length outside off, draws a loose poke from the batsman and goes past the outside edge
back of a length and slanting in from outside off, inside-edged onto the pad
back of a length and holds its line outside off, carved away to the right of deep third man
bouncer, beats the hook, and thuds into the gloves of Wade
on a length and outside off, pushes away from the body and squirts an inside edge past leg stump
short on middle, Denly dares to step down the track. He adjusts to the slower ball and muscles it to the wide long-on fence
short and zips back in, chopped away to point
full and straight, clipped away to midwicket
short and spins in from outside off, punched through the line to extra-cover

Botha strikes with his third ball: a non-turner. This is the arm ball, Botha hits a hard length and top of middle stump. Denly ventures outside leg and aims a punch through extra-cover. He does not make contact. Botha, though, hits the stumps and celebrates
darted full on the pads, knocked down to long-on off the front foot
short and slides in towards the top of off, pushed back to Botha off the back foot
darted on middle, stabbed back to Botha to round out the over
back of a length and angling across off, 142ks, guided to point
hip-high short ball on leg stump, Hughes swivels on the back foot and pulls it away over square leg for four. The man in the deep is rather finer
overpitched and outside off, drilled through the line but straight to extra-cover
very full and swinging into the pads, deflected away square through the leg side
full and outside off, driven on the up to mid-off
bouncer, zipping away and thudding into the gloves of the keeper, wide called
shorter and angling away outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover

an appeal for caught behind, and the finger goes up. Arm ball once again from Botha, Avendano backs away outside leg and feathers it behind. Little deflection and Wade snaps it up. Two wickets in five balls for Botha
Henriques jumps across off and laps a length ball away to the fine-leg boundary. Henriques silences the crowd with a first-ball four
full and breaks in, off the inside half and rolls away square through the leg side
on a length and outside off, Henriques props forward and taps to the covers
full and straight, driven off the front foot to long-on
darted short on middle, punched back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, driven firmly to short cover's right and mid-off's left
back of a length and on the pads, tickled away to fine leg
back of a length and outside off, he presses forward and drives through the gap at covers
back of a length and straightens outside off, prodded away to third man boundary
back of a length and kicks up to beat the outside edge and thud into the gloves of Wade
on a length and outside off, stabs an outside edge fine of deep third man. Sliding save at the edge of the boundary
back of a length and outside off, rides the bounce and steers it down to deep third man
full and wide, squeezed to point
on a length and just a shade outside off, punched up to mid-off
punched on the up but can't beat short extra-cover
back of a length and skids back in at off, catches the batsman in a tangle, inside-edged onto the pad
full and outside off, thrashed straight to extra-cover, again
pushed through outside off, gets forward and drives to long-off
full and skids on off, Rose draws a leading edge to point as the batsman aims to force the pace
dangled up wider, Henriques goes after it and nearly chops it back on
yorker on off, jabbed away to the left of Rose
a bit too full on middle, right in Hughes' swinging arc. He drops down to one knee and mows the ball over midwicket
whipped from outside off to cow corner, this time along the ground
hip-high short ball on middle, Hughes swivels on the back foot and nails a pull to the square leg boundary
pitched up and outside off, driven straight of long-on off the front foot
short and holds its line outside off, opens the face and punches to point
full on the stumps, driven down to long-on
straying into the hips, tickled to short fine leg
full and outside off, possible a slower ball, whipped away to deep midwicket
full and turns in, skewed off the inside half to deep midwicket
short and skids on outside off, punched to sweeper off the back foot
Hughes eyes up the midwicket boundary with a slog-sweep and only gets an inside edge onto the back pad
tossed outside off, driven through the line to sweeper
flatter and shorter outside off, knocked into the leg side for one
Henriques goes back and punches this shortish ball from outside off to long-off
skids on outside off, patted to the covers for one
really full on middle, down the track and driven fluently to long-on for one
tossed outside off, Henriques goes low and launches it into the top tier. Monster slog-sweep with the break
darted full and wide outside off, flashed to the right of sweeper cover
fired on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
short and slides on outside off, punched back
flighted and outside off, Hughes likes the flight and clouts it into the stands beyond midwicket. Another rasping slog-sweep
shorter and breaks away outside off, forced off the back foot to cover
very full and outside off, tapped down to long-off
yorker on off, jammed down to long-on

Henriques swings to the leg side but does not make contact with the turning ball. This was a wrong'un. Wade fumbles but swoops to his right, collects the ball and throws it to Short, who catches Henriques short at the bowler's end. Snazzy back-hand from Short. So much risk for a bye and Henriques is gone
tucked around the corner
just short of a good length and outside off, punched away to deep point
shortish and outside off, guided to point. Silk risks a single. A direct hit could have had him
shortish and outside off, punched up to sweeper cover
looks like a slower ball outside off, cracked to sweeper cover
Top-edge drops into no-man's land. McDermott sprints from deep square leg but the ball lands in front of his dive. Banged in short and outside off, Hughes miscues a hook. Hughes raises his fifty
short and wide, slashed away behind point. The ball thuds into the boundary
tossed outside off, driven to sweeper cover off the front foot
full-toss outside off, lofted away to long-on
short and skidding into the thigh pad, clipped away to the leg side off the back foot
glanced to short fine leg
backs away and digs out a yorker through cover
dropped short and wide outside off, slapped away wide of sweeper cover for four
flat-batted from outside off to sweeper
backs away and pushes a full ball back to Botha
short and outside off, front-of-the-hand slider, slashed to sweeper cover. The bails light up. Wade had disturbed it and not the batsman
swatted away to deep midwicket
tossed outside off, down the track and drilled to sweeper cover
tossed on middle, Hughes can't clear deep midwicket. He holes out to McDermott. Hughes swings, but does not get all of it. Crucial wicket for Sixers
back of a length and outside off, forced to midwicket
back of a length and outside off, punched away for one
short and outside off, slapped to short cover
back-of-the-hand variety from Faulkner. Shorter and slower outside off, slapped in the air. Bailey at short cover plucks out a smart catch
on a length and outside off, clipped to deep square leg
full-toss outside off, smeared away to the left of short cover
nice and full on middle, backs away and drives to the left of long-off
full-toss on middle and leg, muscled away to the left of deep midwicket for four
full and outside off, whipped to midwicket
bouncer, flies through to the keeper, as Curran yanks his body out of the way
Curran backs away outside leg, Archer follows him with a short ball. Curran arches his back and ramps it away to the right of the keeper. Archer has a wry smile on his face
full and outside off, Curran goes after it and slices a thick outside edge to deep third man
Meredith looks for the yorker, comes out as a full-toss, which is belted away over the ducking bowler for four. He tumbles in his followthrough but that was Shastri's tracer bullet
wide yorker, well executed by Meredith, beats Curran's swing
full and wide outside off, scythed away to sweeper cover
on a length and outside off, hacked away to long-on

full-toss, inside-edged onto the pad. They chance a single. Meredith swoops in on the ball from his followthrough and under-arms it onto the stumps. Phillipe himself dishes in a dive and makes his crease. Good cricket all around
Phillipe jumps across off and drags a full ball from outside off to long-on
too full on leg stump, Archer doesn't get the yorker right. Phillipe doesn't get enough power. He holes out to long-on and gives Archer his first wicket of the evening
short on the hips, short-armed away behind square on the leg side
full and outside off, hit to mid-off for one
yorker on off and middle, squeezed down the ground past the bowler. Doolan runs from long-on towards long-off, slides, and lets the ball roll away to the boundary
slower, short ball on off, miscues a pull to Archer
Curran shuffles across off but does not make contact with an adventurous ramp over the keeper's head
Caught in the crowd! Short and outside off, muscled away into the grassbanks over square leg
Caught in the outfield now. Slower ball, 110ks, of the back of the hand variety. Swings and holes out to deep midwicket does Abbott
full and wide outside off, sliced on the bounce to deep third man
full and right in the slot, Curran swipes it straight into the lap of deep midwicket. Another change-up, another wicket
short and outside off, stays beside the line and smites it up and over extra-cover
slower one outside off, outside-edged to third man
short and outside off, jabbed to long-on for one
short on the hips, swivels on the back foot and swats it fiercely to the square leg boundary. Boom
slider on off, cramps the batsman for room, chopped to point
back of a length on middle, shovelled to deep midwicket off the back foot
non-turner outside off, presses forward and taps to cover
on a length and outside off, played back to the bowler
short and outside off, forced between point and covers for four. Easy pickings for Short
short and outside off, slashed behind point
back of a length, swings away against the angle. Beats Wade's swipe to leg
full on middle and leg, nudged to mid-on
on a length and skirts past the outside edge
back of a length on off, punched back
Wade shifts outside leg and pings it inside-out over extra-cover
shuffles outside leg, the bowler follows him with a short ball that is pulled away to square leg boundary
moves outside leg and lifts a length ball to long-on
skids on to hit the pad
tossed on middle, drilled straight of mid-off for four - third of the over
full on middle, speared down to long-on for one
pitched up and outside off, drilled back
guided to third man
slower short ball on middle, pulled to deep midwicket
bouncer, too high, wide
Top-edged to deep third man. Curran hits a hard length outside off. Wade dares to pull off the front foot. He skies it to SOK, who keeps his cool, dives to his right and snaffles it
back of a length and outside off, off the inside half to square leg
angling in from over the wicket and straightens away past the outside edge
full and straight, driven away between midwicket and mid-on
back of a length and slanting away past outside edge
chipped in the air... one bounce to mid-on
short, wide, cut to backward point, where there's a misfield
Short gets behind the line of this short ball outside off and plays to point
whipped off the pads to deep square leg
pitches outside leg, hits the pad, rolls to point
pulled away to deep midwicket
on a length and outside off, heaved to the left of deep midwicket
good length and holds its line just a shade outside off to beat the outside edge
slower offcutter, inside-edged onto the pad? The umpire reckons so and gives it as runs
Short pulls a high-high short ball to deep midwicket
looped up on the leg stump, driven to long-on for one
dragged down on the  leg stump, Doolan swivels back and pulls behind square for four
shorter and wider of off, muscled to deep midwicket

Another tag-team catch at the boundary? Silk leaps, catches the ball, but the momentum carries him beyond the boundary. He is in contact with the ball as he tips beyond. He then releases it to Henriques who is inside the field of play. The result is a six. Tossed outside off, lofted towards deep midwicket
whipped to long-on
reverse-swept from stumps to short third man
yorker on off, squeezed through point
Phillipe has dropped a sitter! Short on off, Doolan top-edges it. Phillipe runs around and makes a mess of it behind the stumps
full on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
glanced off the pads to long leg
full on the stumps, driven down to long-on
full-toss on off, hit to long-on
driven down to long-off
very full on off, driven back, the bowler deflects it to mid-off
backs away and forces the ball to midwicket
near yorker on off, dug back
stabbed to the covers
on a length and outside off, Doolan clears his front leg and belts it away to the left of the bowler and even beats long-off to his right
speared outside off, smashed back, the umpire is in the firing line
very full at the legs, worked to square leg
shuffles across and paddles to fine leg
pretty full and outside off, muscled away to the midwicket boundary, and that's 1000 BBL runs for Short
full-toss outside off, cracked to wide long-off
pushed through on middle, paddled away, beats fine leg's dive in the deep
darted full on middle, squeezed onto the pitch
short and outside off, Doolan jumps outside leg and scythes it over covers
short, wide, flashed to short cover
back of a length on middle, Doolan clears his front leg and swings it straight to deep midwicket
full and seams away past the outside edge
punched to short extra-cover
very full on off, jammed to long-on
tossed on off, defended back
driven to short cover off front foot
down the track and mistimed to long-on
full and right in the swinging arc of Short. That's outta here. Short pummels it onto the roof over midwicket
tossed on the pads, chipped to deep midwicket. Short brings up another BBL fifty
full at the pads, picked off to the boundary rider at midwicket
slower ball outside off, forced to sweeper
yorker on off, dug out to long-off
short, pings the helmet, and flies to short third man
slower short ball, pulled away to deep square
yorker on leg stump, squeezed to deep midwicket
yotker, swings in, beats the bat, off stump, on its way to the keper
short and outside off, top-edges a hook into the stands beyond square leg
back of a length and outside off, nonchalantly picked up and whipped to the midwicket boundary
yorker, tails in to catch the pad, but that's probably heading down leg
back of a length and outside off, forced to mid-off
full and swings in, inside-edges a flick to square leg
Abbott yorks Short and brings the Sixers back into the game. Right in the blockhole, swings in, sneaks under the bat. Timbaaaah. Short falls for 64 off 42 balls
full-toss on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
full and outside off, closes the face and clips to deep midwicket
back of a length and moves away against the angle to go past the outside edge
fended back to the bowler
very full on middle and leg, tucked around the corner
worked to leg
grip and turn to beat Bailey outside off
Bailey runs down the track, meets the pitch of this legbreak, and slams it with the spin over extra-cover
here comes Bailey: down the track and launched straight over Denly's head. Mighty blow
dropped short and outside off, flat-batted away to sweeper cover
full on middle, swept flat and hard through backward square leg four
full and outside off, lashed to long-off
short, wide, slapped to point
SOK tosses it full and outside off, McDermott loads up for a slog-sweep but can't clear the boundary. Picks out Jordan Silk at deep midwicket. Silk is one the best fielders at the Sixers
down the track and hit to long-on
floated up outside off, Bailey manufactures a half-volley by venturing down the track and smoking it over the bowler's head
dangled up wider outside off, carved away to sweeper cover
full and straight, whipped to deep midwicket
Curran runs his fingers across this slower ball outside off beats Milenko
full-toss on middle, hit to long-on
full on off, not a yorker, jammed to long-off
accurate yorker on middle, dug out
full and outside off, speared to long-off
good length just a shade outside off, Bailey mows it into the stands beyond wide long-on. Boom. In the slot and put away
full on middle and leg, dragged to long-on's right
another length ball outside off, now it's Milenko's turn to pump it over the midwicket boundary. Abbott has missed his lengths twice and has conceded two sixes this over
back of a length and wide outside off, away from the reach of Milenko
full-toss outside off, Milenko, having backed away outside leg, swings and misses
pitched up and outside off, slapped to the covers for one
full on off stump, Milenko pushes to long-on and ponders about two, but Bailey sends him back. Just a single in the end.

Henriques pulls off a fine catch at short cover. He flies to his left and takes it with both hands. Full-toss outside off, Bailey carves it in the air and Henriques plucks it out and celebrates with a fist pump
very full and angling into off, tapped down to long-on. Milenko and Faulkner hare back for the second and they do it. Hard-run two. Gold for Hurricanes
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat and through to the keeper. Faulkner gets across for a bye. Scores are tied in Hobart
full-toss on off, Milenko jumps across off and picks it away to the midwicket boundary. Hurricanes win by five wickets
